titleStmt.title: The young damsels courage and conquest: or, The close encounter between Country Kate and a lusty soldier of Flanders. Tune of March boys, &c. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Prinpet [sic] for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, and J[ohn]. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Publishers' names, date and place of publication from Wing.
Verse: "A souldier from Flanders he travell'd os [sic] late ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
